Interface ChessBoard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaFXChessBoard, SwingChessBoard

    public interface ChessBoard
    the chess board for the game
    Author:
    Escanord Le

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPiece(ChessPiece piece, int row, int column)
      adds a chess piece to a given row and column on the board
      ChessGame getGameRules()
      returns the game rule being played on this board
      ChessPiece getPiece(int row, int column)
      returns the piece at the given row and column
      boolean hasPiece(int row, int column)
      returns if there is any piece at the given row and column
      ChessPiece removePiece(int row, int column)
      removes the chess piece at the given row and column and returns it
      default boolean squareThreatened(int row, int column, ChessPiece piece)
      returns if there is any opponent's piece threatening current row and column

    • Method Detail

      • getGameRules

        ChessGame getGameRules()
        returns the game rule being played on this board
        Returns:
        the ChessGame being played on this board

      • addPiece

        void addPiece(ChessPiece piece,
              int row,
              int column)
        adds a chess piece to a given row and column on the board
        Parameters:
        piece - the chess piece to be added
        row - the row to add the piece to
        column - the column to add the piece to

      • removePiece

        ChessPiece removePiece(int row,
                       int column)
        removes the chess piece at the given row and column and returns it
        Parameters:
        row - the given row of the piece to be removed
        column - the given column of the piece to be removed

      • hasPiece

        boolean hasPiece(int row,
                 int column)
        returns if there is any piece at the given row and column
        Parameters:
        row - the given row to be checked
        column - the given column to be checked
        Returns:
        true if there is any piece at the given row and column, false otherwise

      • getPiece

        ChessPiece getPiece(int row,
                    int column)
        returns the piece at the given row and column
        Parameters:
        row - the given row
        column - the given column

      • squareThreatened

        default boolean squareThreatened(int row,
                                 int column,
                                 ChessPiece piece)
        returns if there is any opponent's piece threatening current row and column
        Parameters:
        row - the given row to be checked
        column - the given column to be checked
        piece - the given piece of current player
        Returns:
        true if there is any opponent's piece can make a legal capture move to a given row and column
